hidden_abilites: Marksmanship improves allowing to attack multiple units simultaneously, and for skill attacks, arrow damage increases by 50%.
Arrow attacks push back enemies slightly.
Movement speed and attack speed of Elf units increase by 5%.
description.skill2: Increase attack speed of elf unit in PvP (0.4%, 0.8%, 1.2%, 1.6%, 2%))
description.skill3: Awakens the hidden special ability of [ Senior Unicorn Knight ]
